name: Shard of Eternity (Demo)
description:
Shard of Eternity (Demo)

Young boy named Marcus begin his journey with his friend, Damian, across the world of full adventures with some of quests, bunch of mobs, and many more.

But the crisis of that world appeared along the journey. Marcus with his companion has to solve the mystery of "Shard of Eternity"!

Full Version coming soon, in development...
